CustomField.description: Indicates if Invoices to be emailed to the Contact should be included in a single email (where invoice size permits). If unchecked each invoice will be sent as a separate email
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if Invoices to be emailed to the Contact should be included in a single email (where invoice size permits). If unchecked each invoice will be sent as a separate email
CustomField.label: Merge Invoice Emails
